esSigners.title: Signature Required
esSigners.description: You need all these signatures of approval to proceed:
esSigners.TooLongComment: The maximum length allowed for a comment is 255 characters.
esSigners.ErrorPrepareSignature-3: Scenario instance or specified step doesn't exists.
esSigners.ErrorPrepareSignature-5: Cannot create an ES ticket: the scenario step is not valid.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-3: Signature instance or Ticket doesn't exists.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-901: A signature configuration for the logged user is already exists.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-902: A signature configuration for specific user is already exists.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-904: Cannot modify signature configuration of a frozen scenario.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-905: Signer is not in a valid status.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-906: The signature configuration of scenario configuration doesn't exists.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-907: The signature configuration does not belong to scenario configuration.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-908: The comment of signature instance is mandatory.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-909: The scenario instance status is not valid to add the signature instance.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-911: The status of ticket for the Signature Instance is not valid.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-912: The format of ticket is not valid.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-913: The authentication token of signer is not valid.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-914: The authentication token is not related to the ticket.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-915: The user authenticated is not valid.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-916: The role of the user who tried to sign is incorrect.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-917: The authentication token does not reference a UMC user.
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-920: The ticket is invalid for this User
esSigners.ErrorAddSignature-921: The ticket is about to be deleted

equipmentEngineering.title: Equipment Engineering
equipmentEngineering.description: To create and configure role-based equipment and physical assets.

interoperability.title: Interoperability
interoperability.description: To manage the exchange of data with external systems.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: To configure common manufacturing data (for example, materials and plant models).

materialEngineering.title: Material Engineering
materialEngineering.description: To create and configure materials and products required for production.

materialRuntime.title: Material Runtime
materialRuntime.description: To manage Material Tracking Units, Material Lots, stock, contribution and genealogy.

process.title: Process
process.description: To manage engineering and production-related activities specific to Process Industries.

processActivities.title: Process Activities
processActivities.description: To design and configure the details of the manufacturing process.

productandProductionConfiguration.title: Product and Production Configuration
productandProductionConfiguration.description: To manage entities representing the engineering elements required for production.

productionCoordination.title: Production Coordination
productionCoordination.description: To assist Production Coordinators in managing and monitoring work in progress in their area.

shopfloor.title: Shopfloor
shopfloor.description: To perform the execution of Work Orders, operations and tasks.

shopfloorExecution.title: Shopfloor Execution
shopfloorExecution.description: To manage the execution of orders, operations and tasks: progress and traceability.

system.title: System
system.description: To manage common system-wide configurations and data.

workOrder.title: Work Order
workOrder.description: To manage Work Orders, their operations and production requirements.
